data.name: Issue 20
data.value: 第20期

data.name: May 2023
data.value: 2023年春季刊

data.name: How your gifts can transform lives in Shanghai
data.value: 您的捐赠如何改变了人们在上海的生活

data.name: Re:news
data.value: 日新新闻

data.name: A story of desperation and hope
data.value: 一个从绝望到希望的故事

data.name: Give now
data.value: 现在捐赠

data.name: Author profile
data.value: 作者简介

data.name: By Hanson Ye
data.value: 作者：叶海生，项目运营总监

data.name: By Jack Niu, Renewal Center Volunteer
data.value: 作者：日新中心志愿者钮嘉昆

data.name: She arrived nearly nine weeks premature and was dangerously underweight.
data.value: 她提前九周来到了这个世界，出生时由于体重过轻情况危急

data.name: The kitchen and laundry are now separate, enabling the kitchen to stay cleaner and prepare more hot meals for our homeless guests. A former storage space now welcomes more guests and training sessions, while a curtain affords privacy for counselling, legal help, doctor’s visits and interviews. The portable shower has been replaced by two new showers with stronger pressure and hot water. There’s level access for older guests who also benefit from a new accessible toilet.
data.value: 原先合在一起的厨房和洗衣房现在分开了，这能让厨房一直保持干净，为无家可归的人们提供更多热气腾腾的食物。原先的储藏空间现在可以供更多的来访者和培训课程使用，窗帘有利于保护咨询、法律援助、医疗检查和采访的私密性。便携式淋浴器被替换成了两个全新的淋浴喷头，提供超强水压的热水。上了年纪的人们更是可以放心使用这里无障碍的浴室和厕所。

data.name: Your gift of 350 RMB / US $55.12 provides a week’s accommodation and job training for one person.
data.value: 您350元人民币的捐赠可以为一个人提供一周的寄宿培训。

data.name: Hanson Ye and Jimmy McWhinney
data.value: 叶海生和Jimmy McWhinney

data.name: Thanks to your kindness and support, Mo Lifang did not have to give birth on the street. Your support always changes lives and often saves them!
data.value: 正是因为您的善良与支持，莫莉方才不至在街头生产，因此我们要衷心地感谢您！您一直在帮助他们改善生活，拯救他们于危难之中！

data.name: Just 120 RMB / US $18 gives hope, a hot meal and emergency help to 12 homeless people.
data.value: 只需120元人民币，就能为 12 名无家可归的人们送去希望、一顿热腾腾的食物和紧急援助。

data.name: If you want to expand your successful training program for the homeless but are already based in China’s most expensive city, where do you go? It’s a question Renewal began asking itself during lockdown, which felt extremely confining while it became harder and harder to find sufficient space to expand our accommodation and training program.
data.value: 如果您在中国物价最高的城市运营一个无家可归人士的培训项目，截至目前项目颇有成效，下一步您会怎么做？如何才能进一步扩展这个项目？疫情期间，我们不断地在思索着这个问题的答案。我们的住宿培训项目需要更大的空间，但这已经变得越来越难。

data.name: Today, through the valuable donations of friends like you, Renewal is laying plans for an agriculture-based training program in the southwestern province of Yunnan, where we could offer longer-term accommodation and support for even more homeless guests than we are currently able to help. Our Shanghai training program is highly successful, but with such limited space it works best for those who can find a good job quite quickly. Those who need more time or who aren’t well suited for a fast-paced city job have always been looking for more varied opportunities and room to grow.
data.value: 今天，得益于您这样的朋友的捐赠，日新中心正在计划一项农业培训项目。该项目的地址位于云南省的西南地区，在那里我们可以为学员们提供更长久的住宿环境与支持，也可以帮助更多无家可归的人们。我们在上海的培训项目已经取得了卓越的成绩，但由于空间有限，它更适合一些能够快速找到工作的人。而那些需要更多的时间、或是不适合快节奏的城市工作的人们，则需要更多不同的机会与空间。

data.name: Fertile countryside offers room to grow
data.value: 富饶的乡村提供了成长的空间

data.name: Rural project gives trainees more opportunity
data.value: 乡村项目给我们的学员们创造了更多的机会

data.name: We’ve already taken trainees to Yunnan and considered how to develop a more rural program.
data.value: 我们已经将一些学员带到了云南，并开始思考如何发展我们的乡村项目

data.name: I have a job and don’t have to wonder where my next meal is coming from.
data.value: 我现在有一份工作，再也不需要为下一顿吃什么而苦苦发愁。

data.name: People who first walk into Renewal’s drop-in center in Shanghai are desperate and hungry. When it becomes clear not only that they want to find work, but what kind of work they would find most rewarding, we look forward to telling them that in one of China’s most beautiful rural provinces, your giving offers them a supportive community, accommodation and on-the-job training – where valuable skills can become their path out of homelessness.
data.value: 第一次走进日新中心的人们往往垂头丧气又饥肠辘辘，但只要他们表露出想要工作的意图，明白自己希望从事什么类型的工作，我们就会告诉他们，在中国最美的农业省份之一，您的捐赠为他们打造了一个充满支持与关爱的环境，为他们提供了食宿及在职培训，让他们能够学习到宝贵的技能，并摆脱无家可归的命运。

data.name: It happened to Yan Shipin, 45. He drops into the Renewal Center for the occasional hot meal, but also relies on the showers and clothing exchange to stay presentable enough to look for a job. In the meantime, he sleeps in the airport for safety and warmth – and because there’s less of a chance he’ll be told to move on.
data.value: 这个人就是45岁的颜士平。他偶尔会来到日新中心接受我们提供的午餐，但对他而言最重要的是淋浴和换洗衣服的服务，因为那可以使他重获找工作的自信。同时，他晚上都在虹桥机场过夜，因为那里比较安全和温暖，而且那里很少会有人赶他离开。

data.name: Our Spring Festival meal includes traditional dumplings, or jiaozi, all handmade by volunteers.
data.value: 我们的春节餐包括由志愿者们亲手包的饺子。

data.name: Premature baby and mother rushed to neonatal unit
data.value: 妈妈和早产的宝宝被紧急送往新生儿病房

data.name: My gift for meals and training
data.value: 我愿为提供温暖的饭菜和培训而捐款

data.name: When former trainee Mo Lifang requested emergency shelter for the Spring Festival holiday, we didn’t know she was pregnant and that her baby was already at risk. At 7:30 the next morning she gave birth on the bathroom floor. One resident trainee called an ambulance while another wrapped the baby up and kept her warm.
data.value: 当从前的学员莫莉方提出想在春节期间临时居住在日新中心时，我们并不知道她已经怀孕了，更不知道她的宝宝正处于危险之中。次日清晨7：30，她的宝宝在浴室的地板上诞生了。我们的一位学员立即打电话叫来了急救车，另一位则将宝宝包裹了起来好让她暖和一些。

data.name: Tao Dezheng had no choice but to leave his family and search for work
data.value: 陶德正不得不离开家人去寻找工作

data.name: That man sleeping alone in the airport concourse – is he waiting for a flight? You might be surprised to find that not only does he not have a ticket, he doesn’t have a passport, a wallet or even a few coins buy his next meal.
data.value: 有个人正独自睡在机场大厅——他是在等候他的航班吗？了解真相后你会惊奇地发现，他不但没有机票、没有护照、没有钱包，甚至连买下一顿饭所需的几枚硬币都没有。

data.name: The good news for Zhang and many others is your amazing support. Your gifts are a lifeline to people who have no other help to meet their basic needs, so we and the people you reach every day are deeply grateful for you and the gifts you give. We are also very aware how much we depend on your financial generosity – and donations like clean, wearable, used or new clothes – to give people a better chance of finding work and making a new start in life.
data.value: 您的支持对张明和许多其他人而言就是最好的消息。对于那些生活的基本需求都无法得到满足的人们而言，您的捐赠能够拯救他们的生命，我们和这些受助者们都对您怀有衷心的感激。我们也清楚地知道，您慷慨的资金捐赠，以及捐助的各种干净、实用的衣物，是我们得以帮助无家可归者找到工作，进而开始新生的最大依靠。

data.name: The Renewal Center gives Yan Shipin, 45, the confidence to look for a job.
data.value: 日新中心使45岁的颜士平重新具备了找工作的信心

data.name: Now that the drop-in center has reopened, we will be looking for more trainees. One big concern is that people are already looking for coats and warm clothes as we see cold weather on the horizon.
data.value: 一旦服务站重新投入运营，我们也会开始寻找更多的培训生。不过目前我们比较担心的是，随着严寒天气的逼近，人们越来越需要外套和温暖的冬装了。

data.name: The Renewal Center’s training program is often the key to successful life-change, and is open to anyone who is willing to put in serious work towards finding full-time employment.
data.value: 日新中心的培训项目通常是成功改变生活的关键，任何有意愿努力寻求一份全职工作的人都可参加。

data.name: Because we serve meals every day, can you help provide more essential food this spring? It will definitely attract more people into our training program.
data.value: 由于每天都需要供应食物，您是否可以在今年春天支持我们提供更多的食物？这样一定能吸引到更多的人参加我们的培训项目。

data.name: Yan used to be a part-time attendant in the public baths, but since they closed, he now scrapes together whatever money he can collecting plastic bottles to recycle. Your kindness makes a difference to him – and will have a life-changing impact on the next person in need. As Yan says, “The clean clothes I receive at the Renewal Center give me the dignity to ride on public transport and interview for jobs.”
data.value: 颜士平曾经在公共浴室做过临时工。但现在浴室关门了，他只能依靠捡塑料瓶换取一点点收入。您的慷慨捐赠帮助了他——也将对下一位需要帮助的无家可归者产生改变人生的影响。正如颜士平所说：“日新中心为我提供的干净衣服使我有了自信，也让我敢去坐公交地铁和找工作了。”

data.name: You can help the homeless hiding in plain sight
data.value: 您的资助给无家可归者带来了自信

data.name: Yunnan’s beautiful rural environment includes a remarkable diversity of jobs, where trainees could learn skills and take pride in what they produce. It also brings great potential not just to expand Renewal’s already successful training program but to support the lasting, personal growth of people in need – through opportunities with employers that are already known and respected in the area.
data.value: 美丽的云南乡村蕴含着多种多样的工作机会，使学员们不仅可以学习到技能，还能创造出让自己引以为豪的产品。通过与当地的知名企业合作，我们不仅可以在那里扩展日新中心已有的培训项目，更能为需要帮助的人们提供长久的发展机会，使他们实现个人的成长。

data.name: A hot meal and shower costs 15 RMB ($2.30). Add a day’s job training for a total of 60 RMB ($9.20).
data.value: 一顿温暖的饭菜和和一次淋浴的费用是15元人民币，加上一天的职业培训，总计60 元人民币。

data.name: Your gifts mean Tao doesn’t have to beg for food.
data.value: 您的捐赠使陶德正不必再去乞讨食物

data.name: One thing you should know is how glad I am that friends like you give generously. It’s vitally important to have ongoing support, but you are helping to meet our needs as they arise. I was especially grateful to see that donations toward our recent Spring Festival were on a similar level to the response for our matching grant appeal back in October.
data.value: 希望您能明白，有您这样的朋友慷慨解囊，我们感到多么地高兴。能获得持续的帮助对我们来说至关重要，而您的支持恰恰满足了我们的需要。我们发现，春节期间我们收到的捐款数额与去年十月份配捐活动期间收到的数额不相上下，对此我们充满感激。

data.name: Emergency delivery in Renewal’s training center
data.value: 一个宝宝紧急诞生在了日新的培训中心

data.name: Your help has never been so important
data.value: 您此时的帮助对我们而言更加重要

data.name: We’re so thankful for your already generous support. Today, you could help get this amazing growth opportunity off the ground!
data.value: 我们衷心地感谢您一直以来的慷慨援助！今天，您也可以帮助我们开启这一美好的成长之路！

data.name: Because we serve meals every day, can you help provide more essential food this spring? It will definitely attract more people into our training program.
data.value: 由于每天都需要供应食物，您是否可以在今年春天支持我们提供更多的食物？这样一定能吸引到更多的人参加我们的培训项目。

data.name: A neonatal ambulance rushed the mother and child to a local hospital, where staff said the premature baby needed specialist care. Fortunately, that care was not far away. It was then the reality hit that had this baby been born anywhere else in China, she might not have survived. Shanghai is the only city in the country with neonatal ambulance teams.
data.value: 新生儿急救车将这对母女紧急送到了本地的一家医院，那里的工作人员解释说，由于早产宝宝需要得到专业的护理。所幸护理中心也并不太远。事实上，如果宝宝是出生在其它的地方，也许早已夭折了——上海是目前全国唯一一个拥有新生儿急救团队的城市。

data.name: Within days, mother and baby were back at our residential center where little Yaoxi (meaning “cherished jade”) has thrived. She and Mo Lifang have since returned to her family home accompanied by our staff member Vicky, who is helping wade through the difficult process of finding a caring long-term solution for the baby.
data.value: 几天后，她们母女二人返回了我们中心，小瑶惜（这个名字的寓意为“令人珍惜的美玉”）一天一天地茁壮成长起来。最终我们的工作人员Vicky将她们护送回了莫莉方的老家。目前，通过一系列的手续，Vicky正努力确保小瑶惜能得到长期的关爱与照顾。
